On April 28 I started a new essay. By May 2 it felt almost done. I'm still working on it. It's remarkable how much further you can take something from "almost done." People who always write with deadlines must never realize this fundamental fact about writing.
You should be noticing some improvements to the quality of recommendations in your timeline
